data.title: Sean Penn’s Mother, Eileen Ryan, Dead at 94
data.meta_description: Actress Eileen Ryan has died at the age of 94. PEOPLE reports Ryan died at her home on Sunday (Oct. 9). Ryan's...
data.text:
Actress Eileen Ryan has died at the age of 94.

PEOPLE reports Ryan died at her home on Sunday (Oct. 9). Ryan’s oldest son, Michael Penn, shared a photo of her on Twitter with the caption, “We lost mom yesterday” with a broken heart emoji. Ryan is also the mother of actors Sean Penn and Chris Penn, who died in 2006.

Ryan’s televesion career started in 1955 with a role on Goodyear Televsion Playhouse. She later appeared in other series that include The Twilight Zone, Bonanza, and Matlock. Eileen appeared in projects directed and co-starring Sean that include The Indian Runner, I Am Sam, and All the King’s Men.
